tvshows.title: Stranger Things
tvshows.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
tvshows.creator: The Duffer Brothers

tvshows.title: Breaking Bad
tvshows.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
tvshows.creator: Vince Gilligan

tvshows.title: The Witcher
tvshows.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
tvshows.creator: Lauren Schmidt Hissrich

tvshows.title: The Crown
tvshows.description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.
tvshows.creator: Peter Morgan

tvshows.title: Ozark
tvshows.description: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.
tvshows.creator: Bill Dubuque, Mark Williams

tvshows.title: Squid Game
tvshows.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes.
tvshows.creator: Hwang Dong-hyuk

tvshows.title: House of Cards
tvshows.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.
tvshows.creator: Beau Willimon

tvshows.title: Narcos
tvshows.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.
tvshows.creator: Carlo Bernard, Chris Brancato, Doug Miro

tvshows.title: Money Heist
tvshows.description: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.
tvshows.creator: Álex Pina

tvshows.title: The Mandalorian
tvshows.description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.
tvshows.creator: Jon Favreau

tvshows.title: Wednesday
tvshows.description: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student at Nevermore Academy, where she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a monstrous killing spree that has terrorized the local town, and solve the supernatural mystery that embroiled her parents 25 years ago.
tvshows.creator: Alfred Gough, Miles Millar

tvshows.title: The Office
tvshows.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
tvshows.creator: Greg Daniels

tvshows.title: Game of Thrones
tvshows.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
tvshows.creator: David Benioff, D.B. Weiss

tvshows.title: Friends
tvshows.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
tvshows.creator: David Crane, Marta Kauffman

tvshows.title: Emily in Paris
tvshows.description: A young American woman from the Midwest is hired by a marketing firm in Paris to provide them with an American perspective on things.
tvshows.creator: Darren Star

tvshows.title: Bridgerton
tvshows.description: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set in the backdrop of Regency era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.
tvshows.creator: Chris Van Dusen

tvshows.title: Peaky Blinders
tvshows.description: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.
tvshows.creator: Steven Knight

tvshows.title: The Queen's Gambit
tvshows.description: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA. But child stardom comes at a price.
tvshows.creator: Scott Frank, Allan Scott

tvshows.title: Cobra Kai
tvshows.description: Decades after the tournament that changed their lives, the rivalry between Johnny and Daniel reignites in this sequel to the Karate Kid films.
tvshows.creator: Josh Heald, Jon Hurwitz, Hayden Schlossberg

tvshows.title: Lupin
tvshows.description: Inspired by the adventures of Arsène Lupin, gentleman thief Assane Diop sets out to avenge his father for an injustice inflicted by a wealthy family.
tvshows.creator: George Kay, François Uzan

tvshows.title: The Umbrella Academy
tvshows.description: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.
tvshows.creator: Steve Blackman

tvshows.title: Elite
tvshows.description: When three working-class teenagers begin attending an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.
tvshows.creator: Carlos Montero, Darío Madrona
